tool_description: Binance Futures Leaderboard API. Scrape data of top users and their positions from Binance Futures Leaderboard. Use top user's crypto positions in your trading strategy. 2000 req/month is totally free!
name: Binance Futures Leaderboard
title: Binance Futures Leaderboard

api_list.name: Get Trader Performance

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
- PERPETUAL - USDⓈ-M
- DELIVERY - COIN-M

Default: PERPETUAL

api_list.name: Get Trader Info

required_parameters.name: encryptedUid
required_parameters.description: You can get it from search or from site

api_list.name: Search Trader
api_list.description: Search trader by nickname. Case sensitive.

api_list.name: Get Trader Positions

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
- PERPETUAL - USDⓈ-M

- DELIVERY - COIN-M

Default: PERPETUA

optional_parameters.name: encryptedUidList
optional_parameters.description:
List of `encryptedUid` separated by comma. Limit: 10 traders
Ex. `151722250827C6026238FE5B77213AB7,5FB5584F9B182E9B07C46613E078EF96`

api_list.name: Get Leaderboard

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description:
Sort by ROI or PNL

Default: ROI

optional_parameters.name: period
optional_parameters.description:
The period to search.

Default: WEEKLY

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description:
The trade type. 

- PERPETUAL - USDⓈ-M
- DELIVERY - COIN-M

Default: PERPETUAL
